com.xatkit.core.server

Interface XatkitServerUtils


  • public interface XatkitServerUtils
    Utility values for the XatkitServer.

    This interface contains the Configuration keys and default values used by the XatkitServer and its internal components.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_SERVER_LOCATION
      The default Xatkit server location.
      static int DEFAULT_SERVER_PORT
      The default port to use.
      static String PUBLIC_CONTENT_URL_FRAGMENT
      The URL fragment used to access Xatkit public content.
      static String PUBLIC_DIRECTORY_NAME
      The directory name used to store Xatkit public content.
      static String SERVER_KEYSTORE_KEY_PASSWORD_KEY
      The Configuration key used to specify the key password of the SSL keystore.
      static String SERVER_KEYSTORE_LOCATION_KEY
      The Configuration key used to specify the location of the keystore to create the SSL context from.
      static String SERVER_KEYSTORE_STORE_PASSWORD_KEY
      The Configuration key used to specify the store password of the SSL keystore.
      static String SERVER_PORT_KEY
      The Configuration key to store the server port to use.
      static String SERVER_PUBLIC_URL_KEY
      The Configuration key used to specify the Xatkit server location (public URL).

    • Field Detail

      • SERVER_PORT_KEY

        static final String SERVER_PORT_KEY
        The Configuration key to store the server port to use.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_SERVER_PORT

        static final int DEFAULT_SERVER_PORT
        The default port to use.

        The server port can be customized in the constructor's Configuration using the SERVER_PORT_KEY key.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVER_PUBLIC_URL_KEY

        static final String SERVER_PUBLIC_URL_KEY
        The Configuration key used to specify the Xatkit server location (public URL).

        This key is used to customize HTML templates and Javascript to connect them to the running XatkitServer instance.

        See Also:
        DEFAULT_SERVER_LOCATION, Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_SERVER_LOCATION

        static final String DEFAULT_SERVER_LOCATION
        The default Xatkit server location.

        This value is used if the Configuration does not contain a server public url, and allows to test bots in a local development environment by connecting to http://localhost:5000.

        See Also:
        SERVER_PUBLIC_URL_KEY, Constant Field Values

      • PUBLIC_CONTENT_URL_FRAGMENT

        static final String PUBLIC_CONTENT_URL_FRAGMENT
        The URL fragment used to access Xatkit public content.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PUBLIC_DIRECTORY_NAME

        static final String PUBLIC_DIRECTORY_NAME
        The directory name used to store Xatkit public content.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVER_KEYSTORE_LOCATION_KEY

        static final String SERVER_KEYSTORE_LOCATION_KEY
        The Configuration key used to specify the location of the keystore to create the SSL context from.

        This property can contain an absolute path to the keystore, or a relative path that will be resolved from the location of the configuration file.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVER_KEYSTORE_STORE_PASSWORD_KEY

        static final String SERVER_KEYSTORE_STORE_PASSWORD_KEY
        The Configuration key used to specify the store password of the SSL keystore.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SERVER_KEYSTORE_KEY_PASSWORD_KEY

        static final String SERVER_KEYSTORE_KEY_PASSWORD_KEY
        The Configuration key used to specify the key password of the SSL keystore.

        The value of this property is usually equal to SERVER_KEYSTORE_STORE_PASSWORD_KEY.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
